title: Quick breaded pork chops
ingredients: ['2 eggs, lightly beaten', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '225g fine breadcrumbs', '3 tablespoons butter', '4 pork chops', '4 tablespoons soured cream', 'chopped fresh chives, to garnish']
